algorithm: The new algorithm calculates the score for each bin by subtracting the integer division of the remaining capacity divided by the size of the item from the reciprocal of the remaining capacity divided by the size of the item, and finally multiplying by the reciprocal of the size of the item to promote performance. The scores are returned as a Numpy array.
code:
import numpy as np

def score(item, bins):
    scores = ((bins // item - bins % item) / (bins / item) * (1 / item)).astype(float)
    return scores
